topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5541252563687240648c0600#post_5541252563687240648c0600

Here's how it goes, it something is good then it'll make you interested in what happened so that these events took place the way they didi

The first comic I read was one of Spiderman fafing the lizard and I had no idea what was going on but Daredevil made an appearance and I got curious about the guy, then I went into checking his stories and I really liked them.

The guardians is a good example. Just grab one, check it out and see if you like it or if you don't, go to the next
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4
